actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the conversion of certain depository institutions from the mutual to stock form of organization.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to prohibit the conversion of savings and loan associations and mutual savings banks from the mutual to the stock form of organization.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the conversion of certain depository institutions from the mutual to stock form of organization.
